artist: Artist: Suzuki Harunobu; Publisher: Yamazaki Kinbei; Carver: Endō Matsugorō; Author: Preface by Hekigyokudō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Picture Book: The Brocade of Spring (Ehon haru no nishiki 絵本春の錦)
signed: 東都畫工鈴木春信 {Tōto gakō Suzuki Harunobu}; 彫工遠藤松五郎 {chōkō Endō Matsugorō}
text: A few months after Harunobu’s death, the two-volume Picture Book: The Brocade of Spring was published, offering poems alongside illustrations of prostitutes. Harunobu must have completed his illustrations in time for the book before his passing.
title: Picture Book: The Brocade of Spring, vol. 2
